name: VALUE Email
description: Educational email that teaches a specific tactic or framework with tactical depth and soft CTA
use_when: Teaching a specific tool, tactic, or framework
Delivering tactical value that readers can implement immediately

examples: How to write 10 LinkedIn posts in 30 minutes
How I got 50K newsletter subscribers with 3 tactics

sections.name: hook
sections.purpose: Personal story or surprising stat that proves why this matters

sections.name: framework
sections.purpose: The specific tactic/framework with 3-5 concrete steps
guidelines: Use numbered lists or bullet points
Include specific examples for each step
Add screenshots or visual references if helpful

sections.name: proof
sections.purpose: Show results - your own or case studies

sections.name: cta
sections.purpose: Soft CTA - try the tactic, reply with questions, or explore product

quality_criteria.description: Actionable steps reader can implement today

forbidden_patterns: Don't bury the lede - get to the tactic quickly
No fluff intros like 'In today's digital landscape...'
Avoid hard selling - focus on teaching
examples: Email about using ChatGPT prompts for content ideation (5 specific prompts included)
Email teaching the 'Hook-Context-Proof-CTA' framework with before/after examples
